yup.minName: Name must be at least 3 characters
yup.maxName: Name must be at most 16 characters
yup.maxEmail: Email must be at most 128 characters
yup.minPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters
yup.maxPassword: Password must be at most 64 characters

form.textRegister: Fill out the form to join the Party Pulse Portal and be able to participate in the GVG activity
form.textLogin: Now log in to the portal to add your game character and start joining in clan GVGs
form.pathOne: If you are not registered yet, please
form.pathThree: If you already have an account, please
form.descriptionForgot: Enter your email address. If this email is registered, you will receive a message with instructions to securely reset your password
form.resetText: Enter your password, confirm it, and submit

toast.sendMail: The email has been sent to the specified address.
toast.resetError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
toast.sessionOff: Session expired. Please log in again.
